member.name: Image.Clone
member.summary: The Image.Clone method creates a newImage object and initializes it with the contents of thisImage object.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to the newImage object.

member.name: Image.FindFirstItem
member.summary: The Image.FindFirstItem method retrieves the description and the data size of the first metadata item in this Image object.
member.param: Pointer to an ImageItemData object. On input, the Desc member points to a buffer (allocated by the caller) large enough to hold the metadata description (1 byte for JPEG, 4 bytes for PNG, 11 bytes for GIF), and the DescSize member specifies the size (1, 4, or 6) of the buffer pointed to by Desc. On output, the buffer pointed to by Desc receives the metadata description, and the DataSize member receives the size, in bytes, of the metadata itself.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.FindNextItem
member.summary: The Image.FindNextItem method is used along with the method to enumerate the metadata items stored in this Image object. The Image.FindNextItem method retrieves the description and the data size of the next metadata item in this Image object.
member.param: Pointer to an ImageItemData object. On input, the Desc member points to a buffer (allocated by the caller) large enough to hold the metadata description (1 byte for JPEG, 4 bytes for PNG, 11 bytes for GIF), and the DescSize member specifies the size (1, 4, or 6) of the buffer pointed to by Desc. On output, the buffer pointed to by Desc receives the metadata description, and the DataSize member receives the size, in bytes, of the metadata itself.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.FromFile
member.summary: The Image.FromFile method creates anImage object based on a file.
member.param: Pointer to a wide-character string that specifies the name of the file.

Optional. Boolean value that specifies whether the newImage object applies color correction according to color management information that is embedded in the image file. Embedded information can include International Color Consortium (ICC) profiles, gamma values, and chromaticity information. TRUE specifies that color correction is enabled, and FALSE specifies that color correction is not enabled. The default value is FALSE.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to the newImage object.

member.name: Image.FromStream
member.summary: The Image.FromStream method creates a newImage object based on a stream.
member.param: Pointer to an interface. The implementation of IStream must include the,Read, and methods.

Optional. Boolean value that specifies whether the newImage object applies color correction according to color management information that is embedded in the stream. Embedded information can include International Color Consortium (ICC) profiles, gamma values, and chromaticity information. TRUE specifies that color correction is enabled, and FALSE specifies that color correction is not enabled. The default value is FALSE.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to the newImage object.

member.name: Image.GetAllPropertyItems
member.summary: The Image.GetAllPropertyItems method gets all the property items (metadata) stored in thisImage object.
member.param: Integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of theallItems buffer. Call the method to obtain the required size.
Integer that specifies the number of properties in the image. Call the method to obtain this number.
Pointer to an array of PropertyItem objects that receives the property items.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of theStatus enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of theStatus enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetBounds
member.summary: The Image.GetBounds method gets the bounding rectangle for this image.
member.param: Pointer to a RectF object that receives the bounding rectangle.
Pointer to a variable that receives an element of the enumeration that indicates the unit of measure for the bounding rectangle.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetEncoderParameterList
member.summary: The Image.GetEncoderParameterList method gets a list of the parameters supported by a specified image encoder.
member.param: Pointer to aCLSID that specifies the encoder.
Integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of thebuffer array. Call the method to obtain the required size.
Pointer to anEncoderParameters object that receives the list of supported parameters.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetEncoderParameterListSize
member.summary: The Image.GetEncoderParameterListSize method gets the size, in bytes, of the parameter list for a specified image encoder.
member.param: Pointer to aCLSID that specifies the encoder.
member.returns: This method returns the size, in bytes, of the parameter list.

member.name: Image.GetFlags
member.summary: The Image.GetFlags method gets a set of flags that indicate certain attributes of thisImage object.
member.returns: This method returns a value that holds a set of single-bit flags. The flags are defined in the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetFrameCount
member.summary: The Image.GetFrameCount method gets the number of frames in a specified dimension of thisImage object.
member.param: Pointer to a GUID that specifies the dimension. GUIDs that identify various dimensions are defined in Gdiplusimaging.h.
member.returns: This method returns the number of frames in the specified dimension of thisImage object.

member.name: Image.GetFrameDimensionsCount
member.summary: The Image.GetFrameDimensionsCount method gets the number of frame dimensions in thisImage object.
member.returns: This method returns the number of frame dimensions in thisImage object.

member.name: Image.GetFrameDimensionsList
member.summary: The Image.GetFrameDimensionsList method gets the identifiers for the frame dimensions of thisImage object.
member.param: Pointer to an array that receives the identifiers. GUIDs that identify various dimensions are defined in Gdiplusimaging.h.
Integer that specifies the number of elements in thedimensionIDs array. Call the method to determine this number.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetHeight
member.summary: The Image.GetHeight method gets the image height, in pixels, of this image.
member.returns: This method returns the height, in pixels, of this image.

member.name: Image.GetHorizontalResolution
member.summary: The Image.GetHorizontalResolution method gets the horizontal resolution, in dots per inch, of this image.
member.returns: This method returns the horizontal resolution, in dots per inch, of this image.

member.name: Image.GetItemData
member.summary: The Image.GetItemData method gets one piece of metadata from this Image object.
member.param: Pointer to an ImageItemData object that specifies the item to be retrieved. The Data member of the ImageItemData object points to a buffer that receives the custom metadata. If the Data member is set to NULL, this method returns the size of the required buffer in the DataSize member of the ImageItemData object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetLastStatus
member.summary: The Image.GetLastStatus method returns a value that indicates the nature of thisImage object's most recent method failure.

returns.para: The Image.GetLastStatus method returns an element of the enumeration.
If no methods invoked on thisImage object have failed since the previous call to Image.GetLastStatus, then Image.GetLastStatus returns Ok.

If at least one method invoked on thisImage object has failed since the previous call to Image.GetLastStatus, then Image.GetLastStatus returns a value that indicates the nature of the most recent failure.

member.name: Image.GetPalette
member.summary: The Image.GetPalette method gets the of thisImage object.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that receives the palette.
Integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the palette. Call the method to determine the size.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetPaletteSize
member.summary: The Image.GetPaletteSize method gets the size, in bytes, of the color palette of thisImage object.
member.returns: This method returns the size, in bytes, of the color palette of thisImage object.

member.name: Image.GetPhysicalDimension
member.summary: The Image.GetPhysicalDimension method gets the width and height of this image.
member.param: Pointer to aSizeF object that receives the width and height of this image.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetPixelFormat
member.summary: The Image.GetPixelFormat method gets the pixel format of thisImage object.
member.returns: This method returns an integer that indicates the pixel format of thisImage object. ThePixelFormat data type and constants that represent various pixel formats are defined in Gdipluspixelformats.h. For more information about pixel format constants, see Image Pixel Format Constants.

member.name: Image.GetPropertyCount
member.summary: The Image.GetPropertyCount method gets the number of properties (pieces of metadata) stored in thisImage object.
member.returns: This method returns the number of properties stored in thisImage object.

member.name: Image.GetPropertyIdList
member.summary: The Image.GetPropertyIdList method gets a list of the property identifiers used in the metadata of thisImage object.
member.param: Integer that specifies the number of elements in thelist array. Call the method to determine this number.
Pointer to an array that receives the property identifiers.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetPropertyItem
member.summary: The Image.GetPropertyItem method gets a specified property item (piece of metadata) from thisImage object.
member.param: Integer that identifies the property item to be retrieved.
Integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the property item to be retrieved. Call the method to determine the size.
Pointer to a PropertyItem object that receives the property item.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetPropertyItemSize
member.summary: The Image.GetPropertyItemSize method gets the size, in bytes, of a specified property item of thisImage object.
member.param: Integer that identifies the property item.
member.returns: This method returns the size, in bytes, of a specified property item of thisImage object.

member.name: Image.GetPropertySize
member.summary: The Image.GetPropertySize method gets the total size, in bytes, of all the property items stored in thisImage object. The Image.GetPropertySize method also gets the number of property items stored in thisImage object.
member.param: Pointer to aUINT that receives the total size, in bytes, of all the property items.
Pointer to aUINT that receives the number of property items.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetRawFormat
member.summary: The Image.GetRawFormat method gets a globally unique identifier ( GUID) that identifies the format of thisImage object. GUIDs that identify various file formats are defined in Gdiplusimaging.h.
member.param: Pointer to a GUID that receives the format identifier.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.GetThumbnailImage
member.summary: The Image.GetThumbnailImage method gets a thumbnail image from thisImage object.
member.param: Width, in pixels, of the requested thumbnail image.
Height, in pixels, of the requested thumbnail image.

Optional. Callback function that you provide. During the process of creating or retrieving the thumbnail image, GDI+ calls this function to give you the opportunity to abort the process. The default value is NULL.
Optional. Pointer to a block of memory that contains data to be used by the callback function. The default value is NULL.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to anImage object that contains the thumbnail image.

member.name: Image.GetType
member.summary: The Image.GetType method gets the type (bitmap or metafile) of thisImage object.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the image type.

member.name: Image.GetVerticalResolution
member.summary: The Image.GetVerticalResolution method gets the vertical resolution, in dots per inch, of this image.
member.returns: This method returns the vertical resolution, in dots per inch, of this image.

member.name: Image.GetWidth
member.summary: The Image.GetWidth method gets the width, in pixels, of this image.
member.returns: This method returns the width, in pixels, of this image.

member.name: Image.Image
member.summary: Creates an Image.Image object based on a file.
member.param: Pointer to a wide-character string that specifies the name of the file.

param.name: useEmbeddedColorManagement
param.para: Optional. Boolean value that specifies whether the new Image.Image object applies color correction according to color management information that is embedded in the image file. Embedded information can include ICC profiles, gamma values, and chromaticity information.
Default. Specifies that color correction is enabled
Specifies that color correction is not enabled

member.name: Image.Image
member.summary: Creates an Image.Image object based on a stream.
member.param: Pointer to an interface. The implementation of IStream must include the Seek, Read, and Stat methods.

param.name: useEmbeddedColorManagement
param.para: Optional. BOOL value that specifies whether the new Image.Image object applies color correction according to color management information that is embedded in the stream. Embedded information can include ICC profiles, gamma values, and chromaticity information.
Default. Specifies that color correction is enabled
Specifies that color correction is not enabled

member.name: Image.RemovePropertyItem
member.summary: The Image.RemovePropertyItem method removes a property item (piece of metadata) from thisImage object.
member.param: Integer that identifies the property item to be removed.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.RotateFlip
member.summary: The Image.RotateFlip method rotates and flips this image.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the type of rotation and the type of flip.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.Save
member.summary: The Image.Save method saves this image to a file.
member.param: Pointer to a null-terminated string that specifies the path name for the saved image.
Pointer to a CLSID that specifies the encoder to use to save the image.
Optional. Pointer to an EncoderParameters object that holds parameters used by the encoder. The default value is NULL.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.Save
member.summary: The Image.Save method saves this image to a stream.
member.param: Pointer to anIStream COM interface. The implementation ofIStream must include theSeek,Read,Write, andStat methods.
Pointer to aCLSID that specifies the encoder to use to save the image.
Optional. Pointer to an EncoderParameters object that holds parameters used by the encoder. The default value is NULL.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.SaveAdd
member.summary: The Image.SaveAdd method adds a frame to a file or stream specified in a previous call to the Save method. Use this method to save selected frames from a multiple-frame image to another multiple-frame image.
member.param: Pointer to an EncoderParameters object that holds parameters required by the image encoder used by the save-add operation.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.SaveAdd
member.summary: The Image.SaveAdd method adds a frame to a file or stream specified in a previous call to theSave method.
member.param: Pointer to anImage object that holds the frame to be added.
Pointer to an EncoderParameters object that contains parameters required by the image encoder used in the save-add operation.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.SelectActiveFrame
member.summary: The Image.SelectActiveFrame method selects the frame in thisImage object specified by a dimension and an index.
member.param: Pointer to aGUID that specifies the frame dimension.GUIDs that identify various frame dimensions are defined in Gdiplusimaging.h.
Integer that specifies the index of the frame within the specified frame dimension.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

When you call the Image.SelectActiveFrame method, all changes that you made to the previously active frame are discarded. If you want to retain changes that you make to a frame, call theSave method before you switch to a different frame.

Among all the image formats currently supported by GDI+, the only formats that support multiple-frame images are GIF and TIFF. When you call the Image.SelectActiveFrame method on a GIF image, you should use FrameDimensionTime. When you call the Image.SelectActiveFrame method on a TIFF image, you should use FrameDimensionPage.

member.name: Image.SetAbort
member.summary: The Image.SetAbort method sets the object whose Abort method is called periodically during time-consuming rendering operation.
member.param: Pointer to an application-defined descendant of the structure.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.SetPalette
member.summary: The Image.SetPalette method sets the color palette of thisImage object.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that specifies the palette.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Image.SetPropertyItem
member.summary: The Image.SetPropertyItem method sets a property item (piece of metadata) for thisImage object. If the item already exists, then its contents are updated; otherwise, a new item is added.
member.param: Pointer to a PropertyItem object that specifies the property item to be set.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
